home.title: üè† Home
home.body: Welcome to ProteinStructureExplorer! Here, you can explore protein structures and learn more about their unique features. Use our interactive tools to visualize, analyze, and understand the complexity and beauty of proteins and their components, amino acids. Explore 3D models of proteins to see details of their molecular structure, access detailed information about each amino acid in our interactive table, and utilize our analytical tools to learn more about protein functionality and interactions.
home.advices: To manipulate the 3D visualization, use the mouse to rotate the protein, the scroll wheel to adjust zoom, and the left mouse button to move the protein. Also, use Ctrl, Shift, and Alt keys for fine adjustments in the visualization.

about.title: About Us
about.body: Discover who is behind ProteinStructureExplorer! Here, you'll find information about the creators and collaborators of the project.
about.footer: Meet the team behind our project.
